name: Radial Blur
description:
Radial Blur is a top-down action shooter. Use the touchscreen to control your ship (in a circular motion) and shoot. Survive all the waves and get the highest score!

This game is still in production, mostly for bug fixes and adding new content. Stay tuned!

The game is also on Google Play!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.anheu.rblur
